Package com.github.lucbui.gba.gfx

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GBAGraphic
    Common interface to GBA Graphical elements
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GBAColor
    A class which encapsulates a GBAColor
    GBAMapTileMetadata
    Metadata on a tile, for a Tilemap
    GBAMapTileMetadata.Creator  
    GBAPalette
    A palette which holds a list of GBAColors
    GBAPalette.Creator
    A create to make building palettes easier
    GBASprite  
    GBASprite.Creator
    A creator for making GBASprites.
    GBATile
    A class which encapsulates a GBA Tile.
    GBATile.Creator
    Creator that creates a GBA Tile.
    GBATileMap
    Represents the combination of Tiles and their metadata to create a full image.
    GBATileMap.Creator
    Creator class for creating Tilemaps.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BitDepth
    The bit depth of a tile.
    GBAGraphic.Type
    An enum describing a type of graphic.
    SpriteSize
    Describes legal GBA Sprite Sizes
